text: @IlhanMN MAKE AMERICA WHITE AGAIN! In NYC, blacks and Latinos die from COVID-19 at twice the rate of whites. In Chicago IL, and Milwaukee County WI, blacks, who are 35% of these populations, are 70+% of COVID-19 deaths. We need Bernie Sanders' Medicare for All NOW. https://t.co/9ABPzlZA1N
